objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='diagonalGrad' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#E0F7FA'/><stop offset='50%' style='stop-color:#B2EBF2'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#80DEEA'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='rightGrad' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#E0F7FA'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFFFFF'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#diagonalGrad)'/><path d='M680 0 L1080 0 L1080 1080 L0 1080 Z' fill='url(#rightGrad)'/><circle cx='200' cy='200' r='80' fill='#4DD0E1' opacity='0.2'/><circle cx='900' cy='900' r='100' fill='#4DD0E1' opacity='0.2'/><circle cx='150' cy='800' r='50' fill='#B2EBF2' opacity='0.3'/><path d='M0 540 L1080 540' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.1'/><path d='M540 0 L540 1080' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.1'/><g fill='#26C6DA' opacity='0.1'><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='3'/><circle cx='150' cy='100' r='3'/><circle cx='200' cy='100' r='3'/><circle cx='100' cy='150' r='3'/><circle cx='150' cy='150' r='3'/><circle cx='200' cy='150' r='3'/><circle cx='100' cy='200' r='3'/><circle cx='150' cy='200' r='3'/><circle cx='200' cy='200' r='3'/></g><g fill='#26C6DA' opacity='0.1'><circle cx='880' cy='880' r='3'/><circle cx='930' cy='880' r='3'/><circle cx='980' cy='880' r='3'/><circle cx='880' cy='930' r='3'/><circle cx='930' cy='930' r='3'/><circle cx='980' cy='930' r='3'/><circle cx='880' cy='980' r='3'/><circle cx='930' cy='980' r='3'/><circle cx='980' cy='980' r='3'/></g></svg>

objects.text:
✓ 3-in-1 Filter Technology
✓ Removes Pollutants & Odors
✓ Ultra-Quiet Operation
✓ Portable Design

product_details.description: Note: The adapter is stored inside the air purifier; Power Adapter(Input): 100-240V 50/60 H Rated Power: 7W Noise Level: 25-44dB Dimension: 6.5 × 6.5 × 10.4 inch. 𝗥𝗘𝗠𝗢𝗩𝗘 𝗣𝗢𝗟𝗟𝗨𝗧𝗔𝗡𝗧𝗦 𝗘𝗩𝗘𝗥𝗬𝗪𝗛𝗘𝗥𝗘: Our Pre-Filter and Main Filter capture lint, hair, pet dander, fine airborne pollutants, and smoke particles, helping achieve a cleaner environment for you 𝗛𝗘𝗟𝗣 𝗠𝗔𝗞𝗘 𝗢𝗗𝗢𝗥𝗦 𝗢𝗗𝗢𝗥𝗟𝗘𝗦𝗦: The Activated Carbon Filter helps neutralize smoke, odors, and fumes. You’ll love the feeling of breathing deeply at home 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗜𝗧 𝗔𝗡𝗬𝗪𝗛𝗘𝗥𝗘: With the Levoit Core Mini-P air purifiers for home, focus on your activities in the bedroom, kitchen, or office. It offers an auto-off display for uninterrupted sleep and calming aromatherapy #𝟭 𝗔𝗜𝗥 𝗣𝗨𝗥𝗜𝗙𝗜𝗘𝗥 𝗕𝗥𝗔𝗡𝗗: Levoit has sold over 6.5 million products worldwide, is available in 35 countries and regions, and has been a pioneer in air purification technology for 6 years 𝗚𝗘𝗡𝗨𝗜𝗡𝗘 𝗟𝗘𝗩𝗢𝗜𝗧 𝗙𝗜𝗟𝗧𝗘𝗥𝗦: Only use genuine Levoit replacement parts to maintain the best performance (Search for Core Mini-RF). Off-brand filters are inconsistent, unreliable, and may damage the air purifier 𝗡𝗢𝗧𝗘: Our products are manufactured in both Vietnam and China, so you may receive a machine made in either Vietnam or China Color - White ** Brand - LEVOIT ** Product Dimensions - 6.5"D x 6.5"W x 10.4"H ** Floor Area - 337 Square Feet ** Specification Met - ETL Certified **

banner_details:
This promotional banner showcases a modern and clean layout advertising an air purifier. The top-left section contains a bold, eye-catching headline using the `heading` text element in a dark teal tone, immediately establishing the product name. Just below, a tagline (`tagline`) reinforces the theme of cleanliness and freshness. Underneath, the `description` text layer presents four bulleted product features in a clean sans-serif font. The `price` text element is prominently displayed in large, bold font, guiding attention towards affordability. A `cta_background` rectangle acts as a button behind the `cta` text layer, encouraging user interaction. A realistic `product_image` appears on the right, adding visual appeal. The background features soft gradients and abstract circles from the `background` SVG, contributing to a fresh and health-conscious feel.

**Color Palette:**
- Teal (#00838F, #0097A7, #00ACC1)
- Light Aqua (#E0F7FA, #B2EBF2, #80DEEA)
- White (#FFFFFF)
- Muted Cyan (#4DD0E1, #26C6DA)
product_color: The product image features a sleek and modern air purifier that uses a clean and minimalistic color palette to emphasize sophistication and purity. Dominated by a crisp white base (#FFFFFF), it conveys cleanliness and freshness. The top grille and touch panel adopt a cool charcoal gray (#4A4A4A) for contrast, blending smoothly with the white body while drawing attention to the control interface. Subtle blue indicator lights (#3BAFDA) and a soft red warning icon (#E03C31) add a tech-savvy appeal, highlighting functionality without overpowering the design. These colors are well-balanced, making them ideal for a banner with a serene yet modern visual appeal.
